title: Are there any catches in Apple's iPhone upgrade program? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will just give you my experience from October/November 2018 when i purchased a newly released 12.9” 256GB iPad Pro I purchased on release day, I accepted Apples trade in offer and waited for their return package which was being sent to me, to put my previous immaculate 12.9’ iPad in. I ordered my new 12.9’ ipad, keyboard and pencil and paid for it before the return package for my old one arrived. Upon receipt of the return packaging I immediately sent my old iPad back expecting a refund for part off my purchase, however what i did receive was an Apple credit note and after contacting Apple w Continue Reading
